seo.title: PageSpeed Score Benchmarks for Shopify Pets Stores (2026)
seo.meta_description: Pet owners expect fast, trustworthy stores. See how 81 Shopify pets stores perform on pagespeed score. Median: 52, Top 10%: 67. Free benchmarks.
keywords: best pagespeed score for pet stores
how to improve pagespeed score shopify

key_findings: The average Pets store scores 49 on PageSpeed, falling into Google's "poor" category
Top 10% of stores achieve scores of 67+, giving them a significant competitive advantage
There's a 39 point gap between top and bottom performers in this niche
Some stores in this niche fall below Google's minimum acceptable threshold
Source: Boostra analysis of 81 Shopify pets stores, 2026-01-04.
how_to_improve: Audit and remove unused CSS and JavaScript to reduce page weight
Implement efficient caching strategies for static assets
Optimize your Shopify theme by removing unnecessary apps and code
Use optimized, properly-sized images throughout your store
Minimize main-thread work by deferring non-critical JavaScript
Reduce the impact of third-party scripts like analytics and chat widgets
Consider a performance-focused Shopify theme if your current theme is bloated

jsonld.name: PageSpeed Score Benchmarks for Shopify Pets Stores
jsonld.description: Performance benchmark data for 81 Shopify stores in the pet supplies industry, measuring pagespeed score.

acceptedAnswer.text: PageSpeed Score is Google's comprehensive performance metric (0-100) that evaluates your site's speed and user experience. Higher scores correlate with better SEO rankings and conversion rates.

mainEntity.name: Why does PageSpeed Score matter for pets stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Pet owners are loyal customers who make repeat purchases. A smooth, fast shopping experience builds the trust needed for them to return rather than defaulting to big-box alternatives.

mainEntity.name: What is a good PageSpeed Score for Shopify pets stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: Based on Boostra's analysis of 81 Shopify pets stores, the median pagespeed score is 52. Top-performing stores in this niche (top 10%) achieve 67. Scores of 90+ are considered 'good', 50-89 'needs improvement', and below 50 'poor'.

mainEntity.name: How can I improve my pets store's PageSpeed Score?

acceptedAnswer.text: Audit and remove unused CSS and JavaScript to reduce page weight. Implement efficient caching strategies for static assets. Optimize your Shopify theme by removing unnecessary apps and code. Use optimized, properly-sized images throughout your store. For a personalized analysis of your store's specific issues and opportunities, consider a professional CRO audit.

mainEntity.name: How does my store compare to other pets stores?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can compare your pagespeed score against our benchmarks. If your score is better than 52 (the median), you're in the top half of pets stores. If you're better than 67, you're among the top 10% performers in your industry.
